ygData.subject: RE: 1hb weapons that are light enough to use...
ygData.msgSnippet: Raean Bloodyhands asked about 1-handed blunt weapons that are light enough for a monk to use. Check here: http://eq.stomped.com/monks/ and go to the Weapons
ygData.messageBody:
Raean Bloodyhands asked about 1-handed blunt weapons that are light enough for
a monk to use.

Check here:

http://eq.stomped.com/monks/

and go to the "Weapons" section on the right hand side. Here is a
comprehensive list of weapons that Monks can use.

Most of them are heavy, being around 3 weight. But the Humerous Handled mace
is light (although once you get it, most likely you'll want to trade it in for
the Treeant fists), and probably the best one is the Sharkbone WarHammer.

Alarys, Silent Fist Monk of the Final Circle
